repnme.cdata!:
Argentina - Public Enterprise Reform
            Adjustment Loan (PERAL) Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Public Enterprise Adjustment loan,
            part of a program of Bank support to the Argentine
            Government's objectives of stabilizing its economy and
            resuming growth, will assist in: (a) the
            privatization/restructuring of public enterprises (PEs) in
            the telecommunications, railways, and hydrocarbons sectors;
            and (b) the better management of other PEs.
